content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be in an excellent location with all the amenities you need. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in the city center, and it's close to all important facilities. I think 500 euros per month would be reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. The location and the recent construction of the apartment justify a higher price. How about we start at 700 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big difference. I'm a student, and I'm trying to save money. I could do 650 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I have to cover my costs and make a profit. 650 euros is still below my asking price. Let's split the difference and say 675 euros per month. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. I could do 625 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for a student apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I have to consider the current market rates and the quality of the apartment. 625 euros is too low for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. I could accept 650 euros per month as a final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 640 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 640 euros per month. It's not enough to cover my expenses. I'm willing to let it go for 675 euros per month. This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [645] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 645 euros is still not enough for me to cover my expenses. I need at least 675 euros per month to make this rental worthwhile. If you can't agree to that price, I'll have to look for another tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think 675 euros per month is too high for a student apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, but the market rates and the quality of the apartment are factors that justify the price. If you're not willing to pay 675 euros per month, I respect your decision. I'll terminate the negotiation and look for another tenant who can meet my price. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
